about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: Hi there! I'm Courtney and I'm a creative developer and technology lead based in New York City. I have worked in the tech industry for seven years and have had the opportunity to be involved in a variety of projects ranging from corporate websites to in-person digital activations. I enjoy getting my hands on new projects to figure out innovative solutions and I thrive on the deadlines, along with the feeling of accomplishment that comes when projects are deployed.

marks.description: I started in the agency world as a frontend developer. Here I made data visualizations using D3 and _________
I gained a passion for all things experiential at Imagination. Here I worked across a variety of technologies and ______
Critical Mass has put me In a role that allows me to be the digital perspective in the creative process. I bring my technical expertise to help bring ideas to life
